workout_plan.name: Multi Gym Machine Workout
workout_plan.description: This workout plan utilizes a multi-gym machine to target various muscle groups. Each exercise focuses on a specific muscle area, promoting overall strength and muscle development.
workout_plan.warm_up: Start with 5 minutes of light cardio, such as jumping jacks or jogging in place. Follow this with dynamic stretches like arm circles, leg swings, and torso twists.
workout_plan.cooldown: Finish with 5 minutes of static stretching, holding each stretch for 30 seconds. Focus on stretching the muscles worked during the workout.
